verses.verse: אֵ֠לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These הַֽחֻקִּ֣ים <S%H2706><s%> These [are] the statutes וְהַמִּשְׁפָּטִים֮ <S%H4941><s%> and judgments אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which תִּשְׁמְר֣וּן <S%H8104><s%> which ye shall observe לַעֲשׂוֹת֒ <S%H6213><s%> to do בָּאָ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֧י <S%H430><s%> God אֲבֹתֶ֛יךָ <S%H1><s%> of thy fathers לְךָ֖ לְרִשְׁתָּ֑הּ <S%H3423><s%> thee to possess כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> it all the days אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> you חַיִּ֖ים <S%H2416><s%> that ye live עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> upon the earth

אַבֵּ֣ד <S%H6><s%> Ye shall utterly תְּ֠אַבְּדוּן <S%H6><s%> destroy אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמְּקֹמ֞וֹת <S%H4725><s%> all the places אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which עָֽבְדוּ־ <S%H5647><s%> served שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> in it הַגּוֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> wherein the nations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom אַתֶּ֛ם <S%H859><s%> you יֹרְשִׁ֥ים <S%H3423><s%> ye shall possess אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> their gods עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הֶהָרִ֤ים <S%H2022><s%> mountains הָֽרָמִים֙ <S%H7311><s%> upon the high וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on הַגְּבָע֔וֹת <S%H1389><s%> and upon the hills וְתַ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> and under כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every עֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> tree רַעֲנָן׃ <S%H7488><s%> and under every green

וְנִתַּצְתֶּ֣ם <S%H5422><s%> And ye shall overthrow אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבּחֹתָ֗ם <S%H4196><s%> their altars וְשִׁבַּרְתֶּם֙ <S%H7665><s%> and break אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַצֵּ֣בֹתָ֔ם <S%H4676><s%> their pillars וַאֲשֵֽׁרֵיהֶם֙ <S%H842><s%> their groves תִּשְׂרְפ֣וּן <S%H8313><s%> and burn בָּאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire וּפְסִילֵ֥י <S%H6456><s%> the graven images אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> of their gods תְּגַדֵּע֑וּן <S%H1438><s%> and ye shall hew down וְאִבַּדְתֶּ֣ם <S%H6><s%> and destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמָ֔ם <S%H8034><s%> the names מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> that הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> of them out of that place הַהֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he
לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַעֲשׂ֣וּן <S%H6213><s%> Ye shall not do so כֵּ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> like לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> lo אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמָּק֞וֹם <S%H4725><s%> But unto the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִבְחַ֨ר <S%H977><s%> shall choose יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֙ <S%H430><s%> your God מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שִׁבְטֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H7626><s%> out of all your tribes לָשׂ֥וּם <S%H7760><s%> to put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> there לְשִׁכְנ֥וֹ <S%H7933><s%> there [even] unto his habitation תִדְרְשׁ֖וּ <S%H1875><s%> shall ye seek וּבָ֥אתָ <S%H935><s%> and thither thou shalt come שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> and there

וַהֲבֵאתֶ֣ם <S%H935><s%> And thither ye shall bring שָׁ֗מָּה <S%H8033><s%> There עֹלֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5930><s%> your burnt offerings וְזִבְחֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H2077><s%> and your sacrifices וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> מַעְשְׂרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H4643><s%> and your tithes וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> תְּרוּמַ֣ת <S%H8641><s%> and heave offerings יֶדְכֶ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> of your hand וְנִדְרֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5088><s%> and your vows וְנִדְבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5071><s%> and your freewill offerings וּבְכֹרֹ֥ת <S%H1062><s%> and the firstlings בְּקַרְכֶ֖ם <S%H1241><s%> of your herds וְצֹאנְכֶֽם׃ <S%H6629><s%> and of your flocks

וַאֲכַלְתֶּם־ <S%H398><s%> And there ye shall eat שָׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> There לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God וּשְׂמַחְתֶּ֗ם <S%H8055><s%> and ye shall rejoice בְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all מִשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H4916><s%> in all that ye put יֶדְכֶ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> your hand אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you וּבָתֵּיכֶ֑ם <S%H1004><s%> unto ye and your households אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בֵּֽרַכְךָ֖ <S%H1288><s%> hath blessed יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> wherein the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> thy God

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַעֲשׂ֔וּן <S%H6213><s%> Ye shall not do כְּ֠כֹל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> what אֲנַ֧חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we עֹשִׂ֛ים <S%H6213><s%> after all [the things] that we do פֹּ֖ה <S%H6311><s%> here הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> here this day אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whatever הַיָּשָׁ֥ר <S%H3477><s%> whatsoever [is] right בְּעֵינָֽיו׃ <S%H5869><s%> in his own eyes

כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not בָּאתֶ֖ם <S%H935><s%> For ye are not as yet come עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> as עָ֑תָּה <S%H6258><s%> yet אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמְּנוּחָה֙ <S%H4496><s%> to the rest וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to הַֽנַּחֲלָ֔ה <S%H5159><s%> and to the inheritance אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> your God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לָֽךְ׃

וַעֲבַרְתֶּם֮ <S%H5674><s%> But [when] ye go over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּרְדֵּן֒ <S%H3383><s%> Jordan וִֽישַׁבְתֶּ֣ם <S%H3427><s%> and dwell בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> your God מַנְחִ֣יל <S%H5157><s%> giveth you to inherit אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וְהֵנִ֨יחַ <S%H5117><s%> and [when] he giveth you rest לָכֶ֧ם מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֹיְבֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H341><s%> from all your enemies מִסָּבִ֖יב <S%H5439><s%> round about וִֽישַׁבְתֶּם־ <S%H3427><s%> so that ye dwell בֶּֽטַח׃ <S%H983><s%> in safety

וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> shall come הַמָּק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> Then there shall be a place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִבְחַר֩ <S%H977><s%> shall choose יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֥ם <S%H430><s%> your God בּוֹ֙ לְשַׁכֵּ֤ן <S%H7931><s%> to dwell שְׁמוֹ֙ <S%H8034><s%> to cause his name שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there שָׁ֣מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there תָבִ֔יאוּ <S%H935><s%> there thither shall ye bring אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוֶּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> all that I command אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> עוֹלֹתֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H5930><s%> you your burnt offerings וְזִבְחֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H2077><s%> and your sacrifices מַעְשְׂרֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H4643><s%> your tithes וּתְרֻמַ֣ת <S%H8641><s%> and the heave offering יֶדְכֶ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> of your hand וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> and all מִבְחַ֣ר <S%H4005><s%> and all your choice נִדְרֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5088><s%> vows אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which תִּדְּר֖וּ <S%H5087><s%> which ye vow לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וּשְׂמַחְתֶּ֗ם <S%H8055><s%> And ye shall rejoice לִפְנֵי֮ <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֒ <S%H430><s%> your God אַתֶּ֗ם <S%H859><s%> you וּבְנֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1121><s%> ye and your sons וּבְנֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1323><s%> and your daughters וְעַבְדֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5650><s%> and your menservants וְאַמְהֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H519><s%> and your maidservants וְהַלֵּוִי֙ <S%H3881><s%> and the Levite אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּשַֽׁעֲרֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H8179><s%> that [is] within your gates כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> forasmuch אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> has ל֛וֹ חֵ֥לֶק <S%H2506><s%> as he hath no part וְנַחֲלָ֖ה <S%H5159><s%> nor inheritance אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H854><s%> for

הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <S%H8104><s%> Take heed לְךָ֔ פֶּֽן־ <S%H6435><s%> not תַּעֲלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> to thyself that thou offer עֹלֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H5930><s%> not thy burnt offerings בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every מָק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> in every place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you תִּרְאֶֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> that thou seest

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but בַּמָּק֞וֹם <S%H4725><s%> But in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִבְחַ֤ר <S%H977><s%> shall choose יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD בְּאַחַ֣ד <S%H259><s%> in one שְׁבָטֶ֔יךָ <S%H7626><s%> of thy tribes שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there תַּעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> there thou shalt offer עֹלֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H5930><s%> thy burnt offerings וְשָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> and there תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> and there thou shalt do כֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוֶּֽךָּ׃ <S%H6680><s%> all that I command

רַק֩ <S%H7535><s%> within בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any אַוַּ֨ת <S%H185><s%> lusteth after נַפְשְׁךָ֜ <S%H5315><s%> whatsoever thy soul תִּזְבַּ֣ח ׀ <S%H2076><s%> Notwithstanding thou mayest kill וְאָכַלְתָּ֣ <S%H398><s%> and eat בָשָׂ֗ר <S%H1320><s%> flesh כְּבִרְכַּ֨ת <S%H1293><s%> according to the blessing יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נָֽתַן־ <S%H5414><s%> which he hath given לְךָ֖ בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> whatever שְׁעָרֶ֑יךָ <S%H8179><s%> in all thy gates הַטָּמֵ֤א <S%H2931><s%> thee the unclean וְהַטָּהוֹר֙ <S%H2889><s%> and the clean יֹאכְלֶ֔נּוּ <S%H398><s%> may eat כַּצְּבִ֖י <S%H6643><s%> thereof as of the roebuck וְכָאַיָּֽל׃ <S%H354><s%> and as of the hart

רַ֥ק <S%H7535><s%> but הַדָּ֖ם <S%H1818><s%> the blood לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תֹאכֵ֑לוּ <S%H398><s%> Only ye shall not eat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> it upon the earth תִּשְׁפְּכֶ֖נּוּ <S%H8210><s%> ye shall pour כַּמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> as water

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> are not תוּכַ֞ל <S%H3201><s%> Thou mayest לֶאֱכֹ֣ל <S%H398><s%> not eat בִּשְׁעָרֶ֗יךָ <S%H8179><s%> within thy gates מַעְשַׂ֤ר <S%H4643><s%> the tithe דְּגָֽנְךָ֙ <S%H1715><s%> of thy corn וְתִֽירֹשְׁךָ֣ <S%H8492><s%> or of thy wine וְיִצְהָרֶ֔ךָ <S%H3323><s%> or of thy oil וּבְכֹרֹ֥ת <S%H1062><s%> or the firstlings בְּקָרְךָ֖ <S%H1241><s%> of thy herds וְצֹאנֶ֑ךָ <S%H6629><s%> or of thy flock וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any נְדָרֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5088><s%> nor any of thy vows אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which תִּדֹּ֔ר <S%H5087><s%> which thou vowest וְנִדְבֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H5071><s%> nor thy freewill offerings וּתְרוּמַ֥ת <S%H8641><s%> or heave offering יָדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> of thine hand

כִּ֡י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> them לִפְנֵי֩ <S%H6440><s%> them before יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God תֹּאכְלֶ֗נּוּ <S%H398><s%> But thou must eat בַּמָּקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> in the place אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יִבְחַ֜ר <S%H977><s%> shall choose יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶיךָ֮ <S%H430><s%> thy God בּוֹ֒ אַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> you וּבִנְךָ֤ <S%H1121><s%> thou and thy son וּבִתֶּ֙ךָ֙ <S%H1323><s%> and thy daughter וְעַבְדְּךָ֣ <S%H5650><s%> and thy manservant וַאֲמָתֶ֔ךָ <S%H519><s%> and thy maidservant וְהַלֵּוִ֖י <S%H3881><s%> and the Levite אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בִּשְׁעָרֶ֑יךָ <S%H8179><s%> that [is] within thy gates וְשָׂמַחְתָּ֗ <S%H8055><s%> and thou shalt rejoice לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all מִשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H4916><s%> in all that thou puttest יָדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> thine hands

הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <S%H8104><s%> Take heed לְךָ֔ פֶּֽן־ <S%H6435><s%> not תַּעֲזֹ֖ב <S%H5800><s%> to thyself that thou forsake אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלֵּוִ֑י <S%H3881><s%> not the Levite כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> you יָמֶ֖יךָ <S%H3117><s%> as long as thou livest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in אַדְמָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H127><s%> upon the earth ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When יַרְחִיב֩ <S%H7337><s%> shall enlarge יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> When the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֥יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּבֽוּלְךָ֮ <S%H1366><s%> thy border כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he דִּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> as he hath promised לָךְ֒ וְאָמַרְתָּ֙ <S%H559><s%> thee and thou shalt say אֹכְלָ֣ה <S%H398><s%> I will eat בָשָׂ֔ר <S%H1320><s%> flesh כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When תְאַוֶּ֥ה <S%H183><s%> longeth נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <S%H5315><s%> because thy soul לֶאֱכֹ֣ל <S%H398><s%> to eat בָּשָׂ֑ר <S%H1320><s%> flesh בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> whatever אַוַּ֥ת <S%H185><s%> lusteth after נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <S%H5315><s%> whatsoever thy soul תֹּאכַ֥ל <S%H398><s%> thou mayest eat בָּשָֽׂר׃ <S%H1320><s%> flesh

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יִרְחַ֨ק <S%H7368><s%> there be too far מִמְּךָ֜ <S%H4480><s%> at הַמָּק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> If the place אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יִבְחַ֜ר <S%H977><s%> hath chosen יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶיךָ֮ <S%H430><s%> thy God לָשׂ֣וּם <S%H7760><s%> to put שְׁמ֣וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name שָׁם֒ <S%H8033><s%> in it וְזָבַחְתָּ֞ <S%H2076><s%> from thee then thou shalt kill מִבְּקָרְךָ֣ <S%H1241><s%> of thy herd וּמִצֹּֽאנְךָ֗ <S%H6629><s%> and of thy flock אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> hath given יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לְךָ֔ כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוִּיתִ֑ךָ <S%H6680><s%> thee as I have commanded וְאָֽכַלְתָּ֙ <S%H398><s%> thee and thou shalt eat בִּשְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <S%H8179><s%> in thy gates בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> whatever אַוַּ֥ת <S%H185><s%> lusteth after נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H5315><s%> whatsoever thy soul

אַ֗ךְ <S%H389><s%> also כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יֵאָכֵ֤ל <S%H398><s%> is eaten אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצְּבִי֙ <S%H6643><s%> Even as the roebuck וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אַיָּ֔ל <S%H354><s%> and the hart כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> so תֹּאכְלֶ֑נּוּ <S%H398><s%> so thou shalt eat הַטָּמֵא֙ <S%H2931><s%> them the unclean וְהַטָּה֔וֹר <S%H2889><s%> and the clean יַחְדָּ֖ו <S%H3162><s%> [of] them alike יֹאכְלֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> shall eat

רַ֣ק <S%H7535><s%> but חֲזַ֗ק <S%H2388><s%> Only be sure לְבִלְתִּי֙ <S%H1115><s%> not אֲכֹ֣ל <S%H398><s%> that thou eat הַדָּ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> not the blood כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הַדָּ֖ם <S%H1818><s%> for the blood ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הַנָּ֑פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> [is] the life וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תֹאכַ֥ל <S%H398><s%> and thou mayest not eat הַנֶּ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> the life עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with הַבָּשָֽׂר׃ <S%H1320><s%> with the flesh

לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תֹּאכְלֶ֑נּוּ <S%H398><s%> Thou shalt not eat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> it upon the earth תִּשְׁפְּכֶ֖נּוּ <S%H8210><s%> it thou shalt pour כַּמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> as water

לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תֹּאכְלֶ֑נּוּ <S%H398><s%> Thou shalt not eat לְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> so יִיטַ֤ב <S%H3190><s%> it that it may go well לְךָ֙ וּלְבָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H1121><s%> with thee and with thy children אַחֲרֶ֔יךָ <S%H310><s%> after כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for תַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> thee when thou shalt do הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <S%H3477><s%> [that which is] right בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

רַ֧ק <S%H7535><s%> but קָֽדָשֶׁ֛יךָ <S%H6944><s%> Only thy holy things אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> may have לְךָ֖ וּנְדָרֶ֑יךָ <S%H5088><s%> which thou hast and thy vows תִּשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> thou shalt take וּבָ֔אתָ <S%H935><s%> and go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> unto the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִבְחַ֥ר <S%H977><s%> shall choose יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD

וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt offer עֹלֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5930><s%> thy burnt offerings הַבָּשָׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> the flesh וְהַדָּ֔ם <S%H1818><s%> and the blood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִזְבַּ֖ח <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God וְדַם־ <S%H1818><s%> and the blood זְבָחֶ֗יךָ <S%H2077><s%> of thy sacrifices יִשָּׁפֵךְ֙ <S%H8210><s%> shall be poured out עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִזְבַּח֙ <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God וְהַבָּשָׂ֖ר <S%H1320><s%> the flesh תֹּאכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> and thou shalt eat

שְׁמֹ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> Observe וְשָׁמַעְתָּ֗ <S%H8085><s%> and hear אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> all these words הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוֶּ֑ךָּ <S%H6680><s%> which I command לְמַעַן֩ <S%H4616><s%> so יִיטַ֨ב <S%H3190><s%> thee that it may go well לְךָ֜ וּלְבָנֶ֤יךָ <S%H1121><s%> with thee and with thy children אַחֲרֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H310><s%> after עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> thee for עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> ever כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for תַעֲשֶׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> when thou doest הַטּ֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [that which is] good וְהַיָּשָׁ֔ר <S%H3477><s%> and right בְּעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> thy God ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When יַכְרִית֩ <S%H3772><s%> shall cut off יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> When the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגּוֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> the nations אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you בָא־ <S%H935><s%> thee whither thou goest שָׁ֛מָּה <S%H8033><s%> in לָרֶ֥שֶׁת <S%H3423><s%> to possess אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מִפָּנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> from before וְיָרַשְׁתָּ֣ <S%H3423><s%> them and thou succeedest אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> וְיָשַׁבְתָּ֖ <S%H3427><s%> them and dwellest בְּאַרְצָֽם׃ <S%H776><s%> in their land

הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <S%H8104><s%> Take heed לְךָ֗ פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> you are not תִּנָּקֵשׁ֙ <S%H5367><s%> to thyself that thou be not snared אַחֲרֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H310><s%> by following אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> them after הִשָּׁמְדָ֣ם <S%H8045><s%> that they be destroyed מִפָּנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> from before וּפֶן־ <S%H6435><s%> not תִּדְרֹ֨שׁ <S%H1875><s%> thee and that thou enquire לֵֽאלֹהֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H430><s%> not after their gods לֵאמֹ֨ר <S%H559><s%> saying אֵיכָ֨ה <S%H349><s%> how יַעַבְד֜וּ <S%H5647><s%> serve הַגּוֹיִ֤ם <S%H1471><s%> How did these nations הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> these אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> their gods וְאֶעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> may do כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> after that גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> likewise אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> I

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> Thou shalt not do כֵ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> thus לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> so unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every תּוֹעֲבַ֨ת <S%H8441><s%> for every abomination יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which שָׂנֵ֗א <S%H8130><s%> which he hateth עָשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> have they done לֵאלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> unto their gods כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for גַ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> even אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵיהֶם֙ <S%H1121><s%> for even their sons וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H1323><s%> and their daughters יִשְׂרְפ֥וּ <S%H8313><s%> they have burnt בָאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> in the fire לֵֽאלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> to their gods

אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> What הַדָּבָ֗ר <S%H1697><s%> What thing אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> after אָנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוֶּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> soever I command אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> אֹת֥וֹ <S%H853><s%> תִשְׁמְר֖וּ <S%H8104><s%> you observe לַעֲשׂ֑וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> to nor תֹסֵ֣ף <S%H3254><s%> it thou shalt not add עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> unto וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִגְרַ֖ע <S%H1639><s%> thereto nor diminish מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> at פ
